name: 彭瑞玟
objective:
講授並整合高齡者產品設計之基本理論、設計方法。分析並研討高齡者因身心機能退化所面臨的處境，包括居家、行動及使用產品時可能面對的困難。訓練學生以工業設計的理論、方法與分析，深入瞭解高齡族群對設計之需求，進而達成產品創新之決策。
Lecture on theory and design practice of senile product design. To study age-related changes in health and physical functioning which affect older people's access to facilities and use of products that they need in every day life. Practice of exploring older adults' experience and needs in using products and their attitude toward product design improvement.
